short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple to do list extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Extension that keeps tracks of your habits in a to do list format with a simple and clean user interface.

You can add, checkmark and delete tasks. 

A fun way to keep track of your daily tasks and habits!


Logo from: https://www.stockio.com/free-icon/mountains-3
Background image from: https://free4kwallpapers.com/blue-wallpapers?page=2
